net.munki.irc.handlers.message

Class IRCMessageHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.munki.irc.handlers.message.IRCMessageAdapter
      • net.munki.irc.handlers.message.IRCMessageHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRCListener, IRCMessageListener, IRCMessageInterface, MessageHandlerInterface

    public class IRCMessageHandler
extends IRCMessageAdapter
    Provides handler implementations for several common IRC messages.
